website_summaries.verdict: This pad has lots of fancy features: 6 temp settings, auto shutoff, moist/dry heat. You’ll pay a little extra for them.
pros: Large size makes it big enough to wrap around limbs, drape over shoulders, or position across the back for maximum relief
cons: Some users don't find it hot enough
If you like your heating pads near scorching, this might not be for you

customer_reviews.title: Received it USED
customer_reviews.text: I received this heating pad USED. The box was open, the carrying bag was missing. There was no twist tie holding the cord together. After spending this amount of money I would have expected a new heating pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not get hot
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is well made but it does not get hot, 6 is the highest setting and it is medium warm at best, I read a lot of the reviews and based on the great reviews I ordered this. I was shocked when I turned it on and it only got warm, I threw the box away before I tried it which was my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size. Average Heat.
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is large enough to cover my entire back, which I love. However, it doesn't get hot enough for quality pain relief. I have a cheap Sunbeam heating pad that gets hotter than this one. If you need a HOT pad, then this isn't for you. But, if you need moderate heat and full coverage, then this may be what you're looking for. It heats up in a just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real crappy.
customer_reviews.text: 2 months and the product is broken. Flashes F and doesn’t work. Real crappy.
customer_reviews.author: Marna

customer_reviews.title: Should be called a warming pad.
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad did not produce much heat. I left it on for 20 minutes out of the box and was mildly warm on highest setting. I'd be better off using towels that come out of my dryer because they'd be warmer than the pad is. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: First one I loved then my husband stole it so i ordered this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. First one I loved then my husband stole it so i ordered this one. Great larger size, unfortunately its already dead. Washed at the same rate as first one. Not sure what happened. When it was working it was so comfy and large. It was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not even warm
customer_reviews.text: This barely gets hot. I suffer terribly from menstrual cramps. I bought this hoping with the price and other reviews that it’d finally be the heating pad to deliver. In fact it barely gets warm. The cover is soft and it’s large so it’s be great for it’s size however if it’s heat therapy and healing that you’re looking for, look somewhere else. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Louis-Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay hot.
customer_reviews.text: The product heats up quickly but than loses heat after 3 to 5 minutes and has to be turned off and turned back on. Seeing other reviews it would appear poor quality control is an issue for this product. You might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Revolution  MacInnes

customer_reviews.title: The Pad only heated up for a couple of minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: The Pad only heated up for a couple of minutes, then went to a low warm setting! Very dissatisfied! Returned item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Plush. Large. Fancy controls. But barely gets warm and certainly doesn’t provide anything you’d call “heat”.
customer_reviews.author: Figen

customer_reviews.title: Heating pad failed after 3 weeks.  Company reneged on its promise to send a replacement!
customer_reviews.text: The heating pad worked well for 3 weeks and then quit working. I made the mistake of contacting the manufacturer directly instead of going through Amazon. The manufacturer was very nice and stated that they would immediately send me a replacement. This was 4 weeks ago. I inquired about returning the defective heating pad and was told to throw it away, which I did. No replacement pad has arrived. I have now been defrauded of my money and/or a workable heating pad. I give the manufacturer very poor marks on product quality and honesty. I also learned that to remedy problems in the future go through Amazon. Sue Parker
customer_reviews.author: Sue P.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is the prefect size for my back. I am 5'11 and I prop it on the pillow while I am watching TV in bed and it is awesome. The different heat settings are comfortable. I keep mine on 4. I let a friend borrow it and almost didn't get it back. I LOVE the two hour auto-shut off. I will be purchasing another to use at work.
customer_reviews.author: Sheya

customer_reviews.title: Tepid
customer_reviews.text: This arrived promptly & in perfect condition. Very nice, soft cover over pad, wonderful size of pad. Controls worked fine. However, only tepid heat, even at highest setting (6). First time use, it got fairly warm, but nothing like other heating pads. After 1st use, it had just mere 'tepid'/lukewarm heat. Not near enough to sink in & warm the muscles to relax them. VERY disappointed in this!!!! It is NOT worth buying, unless I just happened to get a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Combs

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointing and useless piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Even on its highest setting, this thing never gets anywhere near hot. It gets warm as if it were a warm blanket. Completely useless for muscle relief, which I needed it for at this very moment. I am very disappointed and will be returning it. I gave it two stars instead of one because it would probably make a good blanket for a cat.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was ok- while it worked. It wasn't my favorite heating pad, but I did like the size of it. I am very disappointed, though, that after using it for six months, it no longer works. Instead of showing the desired heat setting, it now flashes F (F= fail?). I have unplugged it and plugged it back in, and it still flashes F. It no longer heats up. The heating pad I used prior to purchasing this one lasted 10 years! This one was less expensive (still fairly expensive, though!) so I thought I'd give it a try. Back to my higher quality, reliable heating pad! Very disappointed that this one died after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Paigeyniels

customer_reviews.title: This is a dangerous product. Auto shut off did ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a dangerous product. Auto shut off did not do its job and literally melted almost causing a fire. Not to mention there is no way to get a refund. A Christmas gift that almost caused a fire. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - The microplush is really nice (on one side, the side you press to your body) - The controller is simple - The power cord is a decently long size, so I didn't need an extension cord Cons: - Just doesn't get hot enough My doctor suggested some heat therapy after hurting my back. This doesn't get anywhere near hot enough to help. Unfortunately, I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The size of the heating pad is great. This is my second one since Oct. 28th and they both stopped working after 2 months. Of course, it's been outside of the return window. The first time I never received a response from the company when I reached out. I loved the heating pad so much, I decided to go ahead and purchase another one to try it again. I've followed the instructions of not folding or bending the pad. I store it flat when not using it. Today it started flashing F. It's very disappointing the quality of the product and lack of response from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps A lot if it didn't stop working
customer_reviews.text: Update: company honored their warranty and got a new one in about 2 weeks, they paid shipping etx. I upped my review to 4 stars as they showed me they are committed to their customers.-----------------------------------------Previous review:I really like the size and heat output but less than 2 months later it stopped working while on vacation! Had to put in a warranty/defective replacement with Pure Enrichment which will take 2 days for them to respond to replacement, so we will see how smooth the warranty replacement process goes over the next few days.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 3 weeks ago and at first it was amazing but now it will get very hot then get luke warm. Also I have to push the power on button several times before it will even turn on. It was great when it worked but now I can’t even use it. Maybe this one is just defective, I’m going to see if I can exchange it for one that works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and the material but it does not work. Either mine was defected or it is what it is. When you turn it on, only at the highest (6) temp starts warming up and after 5 minutes the temperature goes down. Also, the heat is not equal on different parts. Returned the same day.
customer_reviews.author: setareh p.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heating pad. It should be nice for the price, but it is worth it. Very soft and plush. I wish the plug was in the center of the pad. It is very heavy and falls over, crushing the pad behind your back if you have the controller where you can reach it on the side. If you turn it over, the chair arm bends the plug in an awkward position. If I hang it over the back of the chair, I can't easily reach the controller. BUT, that would not make me reconsider my purchase. Love that I can heat my entire back with this heating pad without having to move the pad around.
customer_reviews.author: fatcattn

customer_reviews.title: My senior pup adores her Pure Relief XXL
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the Pure Relief XXl for a month now and my 9 year old chihuahua loves it. It’s perfect for these cold winter days/nights. It’s mashine washable and shuts up if you choose for it to turn off. I would buy this in a heartbeat if I had too.
customer_reviews.author: BriE.

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly, very soft and pliable
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this heating blanket. I use it nightly to warm my feet in bed. It heats quickly and I use the lowest setting because it can get very hot. The material is high quality and very soft. My last heating pad was a rigid and stiff plastic with the fabric cover.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Soft, heats well, very big.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect heating pad. It is large enough that it covers both shoulders and most of my back. It also gets super warm, actually gets too warm for me on anything above a 4!! Works great. Very soft and it is all one piece and it isn't plastic like some heating pads. Doesnt bunch up like some heating pads either. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Large and it gets good and hot...!
customer_reviews.text: Nice heating pad. Has 6 levels of heat. Heats up quickly... I, sometimes experience muscle fatigue and burning in my upper-shoulder-back area. If it goes on long enough it may cause me to walk funny...and then my lower-back gets involved. I think I have just about every massaging contraption available. But, using heat on my muscles is an important part of the solution for me. This Heating-pad is HUGE...and covers my entire back... Achieves a high-enough level of heat...to help alleviate the discomfort from my muscles. But...not so hot as to cause discomfort from the heat-level...
customer_reviews.author: lordhavemercy

customer_reviews.title: Its nice, but could be better. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Update: This heating pad is nice, doesn't get hot enough for my liking. I wish there were hotter heat settings, but I cannot find one that will get hotter, so I guess this will do. I will say that I liked how the company made it right, even though I didn't complain to them. I haven't used the replacement pad yet, but hopefully it is better. Overall, not bad for the price, wish it was hotter and bigger but eh not bad.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 heating pads. Have only used 2 of the 3. Within 4 months, both stopped working. After following the vendors instructions, one started back working. I'm in the process of working with the vendor to have the second one replaced. Too much hassle. Will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerealine West

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy BEWARE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE IF YOU HAD A FAIL HEATING PAD GO ON THEIR FACEBOOK PAGE AND LEAVE REVIEWS IN COMMENTS. THEY NEED TO HONOR THEIR GUARANTEE!!! This would be an awesome product if if lasted but unfortunately I have bought 7 some for myself, some for my daughter. 2 I just bought thinking they would stand behind their products but out of the other 5...3 will no longer work. I have emailed and my daughter emailed..I have called and still no response. Guarante is worthless
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, The Heat stays ON until I shut it off
customer_reviews.text: I have to use heat pad 24/7 and thus one is the best I have bought to date. I love the feature that it will stay on or you can choose auto off oh that is such a great feature. It is very powerful and I only use it on 3 so it gets very hot if you want it to. Perfect bigger size so your entire back & shoulders which help with my pain immensely. Definitely buy this Heat pad if you live with pain and want stay on feature and larger size
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Only stays hot for a short time.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and how soft it is but I guess heating pads nowadays limit the heat. So I turn it on and it gets nice and hot on the highest setting and it only stays that hot for maybe 15 minutes then cools way down for 45 minutes then it gets hot again for 15 minutes, over and over. I use it for migraines and I need on that stays hot. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: pixie.susan

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure it’s wonderful..... mine just arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure on how to get in contact with the company. I will change the review because I’ve heard wonderful things about this EXACT same item. I purchased it for my sister after she had a pretty serious car accident. And she loved it. Recently pregnant I’ve been experiencing tremendous back pain. I was so excited to finally have one of my own but Item defective upon arrival. It’s reading an F message in all of my outlets. Even in the in-laws house. Tried everything. Nothing seems to be working. Not sure if I have to return the entire item. Or if they will send out a replacement peace for this problem. Please contact me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chronic Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom who has a lot of chronic pain due to stenosis and arthritis in her back. She tells me since she has received this she uses it nightly. The auto off feature is great as it allows her to fall asleep while using it and not worry about being burned. the Moist heat really helps relieve muscle soreness. Large size helps ease pain from larger surface areas so she doesn't have to choose what part of her back is going to get relief from it. Item comes with a storage bag which she loves since it prevents the pad from getting dirty when not in use. Would highly reccommend
customer_reviews.author: DesertChild629

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product. It did not heat sufficiently and the luke warmth was uneven. Just no reason to keep it. **UPDATED** After writing the above review, we randomly received a new mat in the mail from the seller, along with a personal note. It was unsolicited and completely unexpected. The seller just wanted us to have a good experience with the product. It me, that’s 5 star service, and the device actually did a good job of heating evenly and up to a sufficient temp to be effective. Good, product. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Diego

customer_reviews.title: not warm enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with achy joints and because it had such great reviews. I used it at its highest setting and I’m not impressed by the heat..I wish it would get warmer. For this price you could just buy a full sized heated blanket and it would be just as warm as this product. People specifically purchase this because they want to use it to treat aches and pains but this product doesn’t get very warm, it isn’t worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moulton

customer_reviews.title: A great heating pad.
customer_reviews.text: I like this for multiple reasons. Large size so covers my back easily. Multiple temps. Can be set to automatically turn off or remain on. I don't want to wake up in the middle of the night and find that my heating pad is cold. The other feature that I love is that it doesn't have a separate, removable cover. The last heating pad I had, the cover would come off easily, or, the plastic pad inside would get squished and not lie flat. This is firm, thick and sturdy and does not bundle up. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. Meade

customer_reviews.title: Another great feature is that this pad can be used for ...
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad was a Christmas gift for a special friend. I chose this particular item after much research on various heating pads. This item has all the features needed for pain relief, plus an automatic turn-off feature, which is so necessary for safety & peace of mind. Another great feature is that this pad can be used for dry or moist heat therapy. My friend was very happy with this item, which replaces his "ancient" heating pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pad Best I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Wow I'm so delighted that I saw this on Amazon home page Such an awesome pad First I've ever had that covers my entire back area So soft and not hard feeling as ones have owned 6 choices of heat plus choice to set 2 hour auto off or not is really nice feature Also I'm looking forward to trying with moist heat by spritzing with spray bottle as directed Plus can wash so when my cats sit on it I'll be able to clean it. I will definitely be spoiled now won't want any other brand/type now. I've owned 6 or 7 heating pads through years This is indeed the best of the bunch
customer_reviews.author: GingerM

customer_reviews.title: Best heating pad ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. It’s huge so it fits literally my whole back which is perfect because my entire back hurts so much. There are 6 temperature levels, but even the highest isn’t hot enough to hurt someone. You can set it to turn off after 2 hours or leave it on with no auto shut off. I’m so happy with this purchase and my back muscles are happy with the warmth and relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great heating pad!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heating pad back in March and it’s been reliable and effective for the past several months. Last week it started displaying “F” on the LCD Screen and despite my best efforts, I couldn’t get it fixed. Tonight I called their customer support and they are sending me a new one. Great customer service and a great product, despite the one issue we had.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: it is printed on the pad that you should not ...
customer_reviews.text: it is printed on the pad that you should not lay on it, that is what people buy it for. It is also flimsy so it tends to scrunch up instead of lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very hot; not as big as expected
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad is definitely larger than my old one, but it's not as big as I had hoped, given the XXL claim in the product name. (Yes, I realize they gave measurements and I should have checked.) Also, it doesn't get very hot. On the highest setting (6), it gets warmish. It doesn't remember the heat setting, so every time I turn it on, I have to press the on button and then click the setting five times to go from 1 to 6. All in all, it does the job but it's not great.
customer_reviews.author: California resident

customer_reviews.title: Never gets hot.
customer_reviews.text: The pad does not get hot. I really like the unit. Seems well-made and controls are super easy. it just never gets hot. I am using the unit to warm my feet while I am in bed or on the couch. For this purpose it works. If you have a strain or ache i would recommend you look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Gets HOT, stays on, and never wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and heat helps to relieve the pain. I go through three heating pads a year. I hate the auto shutoff features on them now. Glad to say this one doesn't have it. Other heating pads I used on the highest setting. Not this one, I set ot on one and leave it. I've had it for months now and it has never been turned off. It doesn't wrinkle like other heating pads do. It is huge as well. I sleep with it under my legs at night every night. Works great. I Love it. Updated 3 months after purchase it stopped working. I'm going to send it back. I'll update after that.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernSweet

customer_reviews.title: Not heating
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 heating pads from this company but this one doesn't work well at all the first one worked so well I bought one for my mother and she loves it. I bought another one recently and it is not heating
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I filled out the form on the website address provided by the seller for their offer of a free hot/cold gel pack. I also mentioned that the highest heat setting wasn't as hot as my old heating pad. Brett emailed back and we spoke over the phone. He is sending me a new heating pad in case the one I received was faulty, as well as the hot/cold gel pack. What I love about this heating pad is that it holds the water spray for a long time on the cover so you can get the moist heat, that the cover is very soft, and that it is big. I appreciate the great customer service from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: K. Antol

customer_reviews.title: Large size fits everyone
customer_reviews.text: bought this heating pad for my wife and I and was intrigued by the size. I am 6'5" and 260 and obviously not a small man. This heating pad was exceptional as it covered my entire back. Other heating pads were not nearly as large and if they were, they were of poor quality. The softness of the pad is fantastic and comfortable and not stiff at all. Many heating pad are stiff and therefore uncomfortable to lay on or try to mold to your body. Not this one. I would wholly recommend this to anyone to purchase. In fact, I bought one for my Mother-in-law as well.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great heating pad with absolutely great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several heating pads from different vendors. This one is the best by far. It heats up very quickly and the vendor delivered on the warranty. I used this heating pad on a regular basis. The original pad stop working after several months. I contacted the vendor via email and explained what was going on, sent them a photo and they immediately sent me a replacement heating pad. In a time when most companies don’t answer phones or emails, it speaks volume then a company honors their warranty while having a great response time. I will order from this vendor again !!!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and left burn on skin!
customer_reviews.text: 1 day after this heat pad arrived , my son was using it and it burnt his skin in 1 area,as if too much heat and electricity came through one area. It literally left a burn on his skin...very dangerous !
customer_reviews.author: Leah Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T HEAT UP!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely agitated with Amazon lately. This is the 3rd overpriced item that I will have to find time to return in a week! The control panel turns on, but the heating pad is faulty! No heat AT ALL!!!! I didn't expect to have it NOT WORK so I threw out the box. Regardless I am sending it back and want my full refund or I will cancel Prime and boycott Amazon
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it but stopped working after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad works very well. I wanted to find a larger sized one so that I could put it on my entire back while I do my physical therapy stretches. It warms quickly and the remote controls allow you to adjust it to whatever setting work best for you. I enjoy using it and would highly recommend it for anyone looking for relief as I was. It works wonderfully and is so soft and comfortable to lie on. 5 stars for sure! Update: I’ve had the heating pad less than a month and it has stopped working. It won’t heat up properly. I’ve am being sent a replacement by Amazon. We’ll see how it works and update again.
customer_reviews.author: Craig and Jenna Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Lived with Cramps ....
customer_reviews.text: I have had the worst cramps since my teenage years, and having a heating pad was essential for me, along with huge doses of pain meds. But every heating pad I ever went through, was small, not soft and sometimes uncomfortable after it gets folded up under you. But let me tell you this thing is huge, covers my whole back and stomach area when I need it and more!!! And the softness of the material is amazing. This is the only heating pad I would ever recommend, also it has a 5 year warranty, the company is amazing to deal with as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Falastinia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heating pad
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best heating pad I have owned. I love the softness, auto or manual on and off setting, long cord, machine washable, and it Is large enough to cover most of my back (I am 5”2’ and weigh 124lbs). I also own several of the XL Pure Enrichment heating pads and they are also great. I use at least two heating pads at a time several times a day and at night. They do a wonderful job of relieving the muscle spasms and pain I have as a result of severe disc degeneration and nerve pain. Also, they have a 5 year warranty and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Marie613

customer_reviews.title: Great Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for a large heating that's soft and doesn't bunch up. I especially like the size of this pad, it's wide enough to cover my back and other areas of my body. Unfortunately it had to be replaced due to malfunction of the controller, I called the company and explained the problem to the agent who was very kind and understanding. He reassured me that he would send me a replacement within a couple days. Good thing I had registered my warranty. I would definitely purchase from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Love this Heating Pad!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this & it seems to be holding up well. I've had a couple of back surgeries & will have another one soon. I'm in quite a great deal of pain. I keep this plugged in & ready to go on the back of my chair. I've tried to get large heating pads before, but they all end up being smaller than I need. Not this one - it's actually nice & big. And it puts out a lot of heat on the higher settings. On the lower settings, it's still warm & soothing. I definitely recommend this product! (Not compensated for this review).
customer_reviews.author: CMelton

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give a 1 star but this was a HUGE disappointment...received pad yesterday and sending it back today....it would not stay on 10 minutes...error light came on and had to be unplugged to reset then would stay on 10 more minutes...very frustrating for my husband who uses a heating pad daily for back pain
customer_reviews.author: Snoozy

customer_reviews.title: Too much money not to last but  8 months
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought this in February and it’s already dead. I ordered it while at my mothers & had it shipped there. Now I haven’t been able to use it for a month cuz all I get is flashing F. I did everything directions said. Nothing. Our house is only 7 years old and I’ve never even washed this. I’m having back surgery in 10 days and had to send my husband to go buy another brand from target. Sad. This size was fantastic but not for $45. I gave 3 stars cuz it’s great WHEN it worked! Never even tried the moist heat.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Soft !! Soft !! And So Warm !! So Fast !!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger ! Better Then Old Stiff Hard Heating Pad ! Great On The Chest After A Long Cold Day ! This Soft Warm Wonder ! Plus Half Gallon Of Favorite Ice Cream ! Favorite Recliner ! The Perfect Tranquilizer ! For A Perfect Sleep And Rest ! What's Not To Love ! Thanks Again Amazon ! Loving It ! Get Two For Twins !
customer_reviews.author: t49y

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Great warranty!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely cannot do without this xxlarge heating pad! I can provide temporary relief to several areas of my body at the same time. I have Lupus, Fibromyalgia, Rheumatoid arthritis, and several compressed discs to boot...I need relief throughout the day and night, this heating pad is my go to! This is my second purchase of this item through the years. This company (Pure Enrichment) is a pleasure to deal with, and STANDS behind their warranty. They went above and beyond to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & FSA eligible!
customer_reviews.text: I am receiving a free Gel Pack for this review, but only posting this because we truly do love the heating pad. We purchased the PureRelief XXL. The larger size covers my entire back and the material is soft, flexible and good quality. It heats up quickly and adjusts temperate using the controls just as fast. I wish the control was smaller, as it's a bit clunky due to its size, but that is honestly the only negative I can think of. We made the purchase to use up some residual HSA dollars. Thank you PureRelief for being labeled FSA eligible!
customer_reviews.author: CVy

customer_reviews.title: great heating pad.
customer_reviews.text: The first heating pad i purchased said it was x-large. When I received it I was really disappointed, it won't even go all the way around my ankles. That is why when I saw this heating pad I knew I had to have it. It is so big and can take care of any pain I have. The different heat settings are great however, I mainly use mine on high! I am very pleased that it has the auto shut off after 2 hours, don't have to worry about not turning it off. Absolutely a wonderful deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rowlettmom

customer_reviews.title: Died after 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February 2019 and it already does not work. When I tried to register it on the company’s website I did not get a return email that it was registered. It worked well while it worked. I have an autoimmune disease that causes me very bad cramps and I thought this would help. It did help but with its short life I think next time I will try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: These are fabulously plush and large heating pads that have great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I love these heating pads for their size and a 5-year warranty. I have Raynauld's syndrome which causes very poor circulation to my feet. Without an outside source of heat, my body can't warm up my feet which triggers excruciating pain. These heating pads do wear out due to constant 12+ hours a night and some daytime use. But so does every other brand of heating pad I've owned with this kind of use. This company always replaces them quickly because I explain to them that I can't sleep due to agonizing pain without them but there are other companies that don't replace or are very slow about it.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Really helped with leg cramps
customer_reviews.text: Wife has suffered with leg cramps and would have to leave the bed at night and sit by a floor heater. Well with the PURE pad laid on her legs she’s been sleeping the night. What is nice is the size and the ability to setting a desired temperature. Then the timer and with the retained heat she’s getting better sleep. Well made, totally recommend this product for soothing controllable heat. The pad itself is made of very nice soft comfortable to the touch material. Good buy..
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 9 months then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this heating pad for its size. Worked good for 9 months then stopped working. Flashing F on the screen. I have a smaller heating pad from Sunbeam that i purchased in March 2018 thats still working great. Will stick with the name brands as quality product that has a longer life span.
customer_reviews.author: AngelReznor

customer_reviews.title: Quit working!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this product. Initially it worked well, then it intermittently started shutting off. Now if it stays on it doesn’t get very hot. And now I’ve missed my return window.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Great until you wash it
customer_reviews.text: Was a great heating pad: heats up quickly, stays warm evenly, and the feature of choosing to stay on or time out is helpful. But I washed it exactly according to the instructions on the pad, and afterwards it was only working intermittently. Every time it stopped working, I unplugged it, waited a minute, then plugged it back in to get it going again. That worked for a while, but it stopped working altogether and I'm unsure if I'm going to buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia F.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product this time around!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one of these in the past and loved it so much that when it recently stopped working with an “F” code, I reordered a new one.....not knowing that it had five year warranty (so I will be reaching out for a warranty replacement on my initial purchase). However, I’ve had this new one that I purchased a few days ago and it doesn’t even compare to the last one that I had. It barely heats up and sadly I’m disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Still loving it after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heating pad 2 years ago and it still performs great. I use it often almost daily actually just to warm me up while watching television. My grandson loves it as well. It’s extremely soft, warms up fast and it shuts itself off. Its larger than most heating pads which I love... Cord is long enough, mine is plugged in behind my couch and it has plenty of room to adjust the pad where I want it, lap, back ect...
customer_reviews.author: Alisa S

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome to begin with
customer_reviews.text: I have had this heating pad for less than a year. When I first got it, it was awesome. It heated well and it was so comfortable. The size was perfect. Like I said, it has been less than a year and I only put my heating pad on 2 and now it is over heating like it is on 4 or 5. It is hurting me. I thought when I bought this, I would not have to buy another heating pad for at least a few years. Now I have to wait to payday to buy another that claims to be good. i bought this one to treat severe pain
customer_reviews.author: The Review

customer_reviews.title: Pros & Cons
customer_reviews.text: If you are laying directly on the heating pad, it can get incredibly hot (which I prefer) but, if you get up and walk away, it loses its heat from lack of direct contact. If you try to wrap it around your arm or leg, it may not get as hot as you would like. However, laying directly on it will guarantee good heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh...Definitely money well spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This heating pad has been a true blessing for my husband and I. Right now, we take turns using it, but hope to have another one soon. We both suffer from back and joint pain and find great relief from the PureRelief XXL. The name fits it well as the heat melts away the pain in our muscles and joints. The ability to set it to shut off in 2 hours or run continuously is helpful. The temperature settings are easily adjustable and the pad reacts swiftly bringing immediate heat and comfort. Thank you for providing such a great product and for outstanding customer service!! Well done! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To echo another reviewer: DANGEROUS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it worked great for a few months, and then it stopped working (continued fault which I figured could be my fault). I ordered another one. The third time I used it, I smelled something burning and I looked down to see the control module smoking and starting to melt!!! Ireally do NOT recommend buying this heating pad. If you do, please be be careful to only use it while you're awake and alert!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Huge, not hot enough for me..
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a very old heating pad with this one. It is the biggest heating pad I have ever seen. It is very soft, and the controller works great. However, I am used to much more heat then this puts out. The highest setting is about what low would've been on my old one. I understand that they have to be careful of someone getting burned, but I want a heating pad that is so hot I can actually get pain relief. So, it's ok, I'll keep it, but it isnt stellar.
customer_reviews.author: sara astheimer

customer_reviews.title: Barely used and it died
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I loved this heating pad. I’ve had it for a year and only used it during my bad cycle days so let’s say 2 days of the month for 12 months. Today it’s blinking F and none of the online advice works. For 45 bucks I expect to be able to use this thing every other day for a year before it craps out. Not roughly 24 uses, that’s insane.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's not cheap, but it's the biggest heating pad I've ever seen and it gets nice and hot quickly and is long enough to cover pretty much your whole back and when your back hurts like hades, this really helps. It is a big step up from the Charlie-Cheapo heating pad you get at WalMart.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Puppy ate my controller..... pure enrichments was quick to help.
customer_reviews.text: And amazing company. This pad is my lifeline. I have a very painful chronic condition and this heating pad is my saving grace. Its large and almost wraps all the way around my body. My puppy got a hold of my cord and destroyed it while my house sitter was staying with him. I was devastated to say the least. I contacted the manufacturer and asked about a replacement part. They shipped me one for free. Your kindness and caring was more than I expected but I am grateful. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Short Life Controller Unit ... Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY ... As much as I loved this heating pad, but It comes with a controller model M03 which stops working after a month or so. I followed the online instructions how to fix it, didn’t work. I bought it for the second time, the same failure happened after over a month and the online fixing instructions didn’t help. Emailed Pure Enrichment twice, they never bothered to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Alborz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful XXL Heating Bag! Worry free purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this XXL Heating Pad! I used it once and new right away I needed to order a second XXL heat therapy pad for my 89 yo Mom! When she received her pad she raved about the plushness and size! I own three heating pads from Pure Enrichment and they are the only heating pads I use because they stand by their merchandise! If you have a need for a heating pad, look no further. Make a Worry free purchase with Pure Enrichment! You won't regret the product once you use them.
customer_reviews.author: ICUfree2

customer_reviews.title: Didn't pass the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: Received this product December 27th 2018. Just stopped working today, April 8th. As much as I paid for this heating pad, I'm deeply disappointed it died and my sisters cheap drugstore heating pad is still going. It worked wonderfully at first and I was very pleased. Used it for multiple reasons. I could especially use it now with my son suffering some health issues and he's so sad it broken. He keeps trying to fix it and it's breaking my heart. I followed all the protocols given in the manual to make sure it would last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia beaverhausen

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This is best heating pad we've ever owned and we have owned many! Heat is evenly distributed across the entire pad. The controller is easy to use and we love to auto-off timer. Only issue is who gets to use it first! Additional note - Customer Service is top notch. We reached out with a question and not only heard back the same day, but we were able to speak over the phone as well. They are super friendly and helpful!
customer_reviews.author: iZjjZi

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the large size of this heating pad so ordered it and was glad I did. I was suffering from sciatica and needed a heating pad. This one arrived fast and exceeded my expectations. The controller is large, easy to use, has multiple setting and an option to either have it shut off after 2 hours or remain on. This is a nice option I did not have on my other heating pads. The company was very professional and called to check up on my purchase, again something that had not happened in the past with other companies. All in all I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heating Pad
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. I have had 2-3 other heating pads through other companies and this one through this company is by far my favorite. I love the size, the option to turn it on and keep it on. It never over heats. A few different times I forgot to turn it off and left it on in my bed all day and it did not burn or over heat at all! It's a very safe heating pad. Love love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake_Bethany Linsley

customer_reviews.title: Great heating pad
customer_reviews.text: My review of the PureRelief XXL heating pad I purchased on March 27th from Amazon. I recieved my heating pad quickly from amazon, it was delivered on March 30th. I unboxed it right away. The cover is super soft and exceeded my expectations. I plugged it in right away to try it out but my wife confiscated it. It worked so well she fell asleep for several hours. After she awoke she was more than pleased with the heating pad. I am currently laying on it and it is large enough to catch all the right areas. This is my first day with the heating pad but so far it has exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Robi Littell

customer_reviews.title: This gets very very hot but that's not a bad thing just be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful this hot pad gets very very hot. I almost burn up at number four or five so be careful. But it is very good and very very large. I'm so glad that I got it it's helped my back tremendously I have osteoarthritis. It feels soft and I like the color. I really like that I have the option to have it on 2 hours for to have it just stay on. If I ever do have it to stay on I keep it on one or two this pad gets very very hot may be dangerously hot but I keep it low and you should too.i love it though!!!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not hot
customer_reviews.text: So much I love about this: it’s washable, it’s soft and flexible, it doesn’t bunch, the “stay on” feature. Other reviewers were right though: it doesn’t get hot. I would say it’s very warm at its highest setting, but that’s it. My cheap heating pad gets hot enough that it’s borderline uncomfortable, which is how I like it. It gets warm enough and has so many other nice features that I still think it’s was worth the purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A.

customer_reviews.title: The size of this pad makes all the difference!
customer_reviews.text: It works wonders on achey muscles. It can fit across my entire back if I need it to. There are adjustable heat settings that are super easy to use. I love that there is an auto turn-off feature, but I also love that I can click to keep the heat steady on if I need that too! Wonderful product! I have one for bed, one for the sofa and one for my husband to use. We really love these heating pads!
customer_reviews.author: M. Idrissi

customer_reviews.title: Best heating pad I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this item far exceeded my expectations. I love it so much I'm planning to purchase two more as gifts, for my sister and mother, who both have arthritis pain. This heating pad is large, the cover is so soft that it far exceeds the quality of any other heating pad I've owned in the past. I also like the fact that you can turn-off the automatic shut-off button so that the heating pad doesn't get cold while you need it for an extended time. And, it has more heat options than your typical heating pad. A win all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: I have Raynaud's Syndrome and the winter is especially difficult for me. I had a smaller heating pad I'd put in bed a half an hour before I was ready to go to sleep but it was small and you could feel the wires through them. This heating pad is soft, comfortable, warm (it also heats up quickly), and simply perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: 1st this would only come to heat, then within a few minutes lose the heat. 2nd it was supposed to be a "wet heat" unit, but when you receive it in order to get that "wet heat" the instructions tell you to get it wet!!!! This is such a crock of poo. I won't even donate this to a charity as the person who has a small income would be wasting their hard earned money on something deficient.
customer_reviews.author: Tannya Siroshton

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pad to fail in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Great while it worked...after following instruction to a “T” on both pad they now flash the “F” code once plugged in. I have verified and I am using the correct chord with each pad, I washed and dried prince directions, made sure they were dry before plugging them in etc. etc. very disappointing because I didn’t plan on having to buy a new one on a regular basis. I’ll be looking for another brand that’s more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: DGG

customer_reviews.title: Disapointing
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 3 stars because they dont work. I just purchased 2 of them in july, one for me and one for my husband. Mine stopped working a month ago and my husband's 2 weeks ago. Well, my husbands dose still turn on if you unplug it from the wall and then plug it back in again. Then it only stays on for about 40 minutes before it starts flashing an error symbol. Very disapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Firegoddess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heating pad
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with my heating pad. I love the soft cover on it, and it has worked well in both alleviating backaches and also helping with my neck tension during migraines. I usually don’t have to turn the temperature up to more than a 2, and it’s plenty warm. It’s a really good size for full back coverage, and you can’t really feel the wires. I highly recommend this heating pad.
customer_reviews.author: magenta girl

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised but I do really wish it got hotter than it does and that the temperature was the same across the entire pad, would be more effective I think.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Have the smaller one too
customer_reviews.text: I love using the smaller one during work hours, it fits my lap perfectly. It does get hot and I love all the temperature settings plus the stay one capability too. I decided to buy the larger one as well, I use this one in the evening in bed for my legs and it keeps them warm and toasty while reading or knitting. It has the same settings as the smaller one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K433Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: It was fabulous until it stopped working- it doesn’t turn on and if it somehow does turn on it only remains on for less than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Angel D Merino

customer_reviews.title: Oh what a relief it is.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fairly broad-shouldered and tall guy and this extra wide and long pad is comfortable and big enough to supply warmth from shoulders down to just above hips. Add a little misting spray from a water bottle and know that moist heat truly does penetrate more deeply and quickly soothes aches and pains from arthritis and muscle soreness. Glad I was able to find one that is large enough for me and has several heat settings. Now, I'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Pappy Rick

customer_reviews.title: Work great at first, now overheats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands cold feet. This worked great the first month and stayed at a normal temp on low. Now, it overheats and feels too hot even on low. The controller is hot to the touch as well. We had to stop using it for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyFeather

customer_reviews.title: Pad works well and support is amazing
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this pad on a daily basis for years and finds that it heats up very quickly and evenly and is comfortable to use. After two years of steady use it ceased functioning but the support group at Pure Enrichment replaced it quickly and effortlessly. Communication with support by email was fast and helpful. Could not be happier with this product and company. We now own two of their heating pads in different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This pad has already been a blessing. I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This pad has already been a blessing. I would give it 5 stars but it says not to use while sleeping. It was purchased to warm my diabetic feet so I could sleep. It does have the option of auto shutoff after 2 hours. I use an electric blanket but it is too hot to sleep under. It really works wonders for ear infection pain. Also the control is very close to the pad so controlling it is impossible at the foot of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Pure Enrichment PureRelief XXL (20"x24") Electric Heating Pad for Back Pain and Cramps - Ultra-Soft with 6 Temperature Settings, Auto Shut-Off, and Moist Heat (Charcoal Gray)
feature_bullets: EXTRA-WIDE 20 X 24 HEATING PAD: Provides maximum coverage for the lower back, shoulders, legs and other large muscle groups
SUPER SOFT MICROPLUSH FOR MAXIMUM COMFORT: Gentle, machine-washable microplush feels soft and comforting on bare skin
HEATS IN SECONDS: Warms quickly to provide fast, temporary pain relief for tired, sore, or aching muscles
USE MOIST OR DRY: Moist heat therapy option provides deeper penetration for more effective muscle relief

WHAT YOU GET: Heating pad with controller, storage bag, user manual, industry-leading 5 Year Warranty, caring customer support 7 days a week, and the peace of mind that comes from a trusted brand with millions of customers worldwide.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
